text: and to all the wild animals, all the birds of the air, and all the living creatures that crawl on the earth, I give all the green plants for food. And so it happened.
Of the descendants of Zebulun, registered by name and lineage according to their clans and ancestral houses, every male of twenty years or more, everyone fit for military service:
The LORD, your God, who goes before you, is the one who will fight for you, just as he acted with you before your very eyes in Egypt,
Nor did Zebulun dispossess the inhabitants of Kitron or those of Nahalol; the Canaanites lived among them and became forced laborers.
this very day I will fulfill the oath I swore to you by the LORD, the God of Israel, ‘Your son Solomon shall be king after me and shall sit upon my throne in my place.’”
He spoke to them deceitfully in peaceful terms, and they believed him. Then he attacked the city suddenly, in a great onslaught, and destroyed many of the people in Israel.
They ignored my counsel, they spurned all my reproof;
You shall become like a terebinth whose leaves wither, like a garden that has no water.
Simon’s mother-in-law lay sick with a fever. They immediately told him about her.
Then the angel said to her, “Do not be afraid, Mary, for you have found favor with God.
He is the one of whom I said, ‘A man is coming after me who ranks ahead of me because he existed before me.’
and scandalmongers and they hate God. They are insolent, haughty, boastful, ingenious in their wickedness, and rebellious toward their parents.
It is due to him that you are in Christ Jesus, who became for us wisdom from God, as well as righteousness, sanctification, and redemption,
Yours is the same struggle as you saw in me and now hear about me.
